children.isVisible:
{{(edit_payment_start_date.formattedDate
	 && edit_payment_end_date.formattedDate
	 &&
	 edit_amount_paid.isValid
	&& edit_payment_type.selectedOptionValue && edit_payment_mode.selectedOptionValue
	&& edit_transaction_date.formattedDate && edit_transaction_id.isValid
	&& edit_payment_status.selectedOptionValue
&& edit_payment_remarks.isValid
&&
(edit_payment_start_date.formattedDate!=edit_payment_end_date.formattedDate)
&&
(edit_payment_start_date.formattedDate<edit_payment_end_date.formattedDate)
)?true:false}}
